content: The link on HL7 is dead for http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/operationslist.html. I am trying to see what the default operations are in FHIR, is there an alternate link? Has this been deprecated?
No, that was an "HL7 website being flakey" isssue. http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/operationslist.html resolves for me right now...
